00046 #ifndef _FC_SHAPE_P_H_
00047 #define _FC_SHAPE_P_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 typedef struct _intpair{
00054     int ID1;
00055     int ID2;
00056 }_FC_INTPAIR;
00057 
00058 typedef struct _faceinfo{
00059   int faceID; /**< id of the face of a part of the skin. decide if want to
00060            keep this since its also the key */
00061   int elemID; /**< id of the element giving rise to this face. there is only
00062            1 since its a skin piece */
00063   FC_Vector normal; /**< oriented normal to the face */
00064 }_FC_FACEINFO;
00065 
00066 typedef struct _sfi_array{ //sorted array
00067   int numVals;
00068   int maxVals;               
00069   _FC_FACEINFO** vals;         /**< array of faceinfo ptrs*/ 
00070 }_FC_SFI_ARRAY;
00071 
00072 
00073 //Innards for building shapes
00074 FC_ReturnCode _fc_getOutwardFaceNormal( FC_Mesh mesh, int faceID,
00075                          int elemID, FC_Vector* normal);
00076 
00077 FC_ReturnCode _fc_buildFaceInfoListFromSubset(FC_Subset subset,
00078                                _FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
00079 
00080 FC_ReturnCode _fc_buildFaceInfoListFromShape(FC_Shape *shape,
00081                               _FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
00082 
00083 FC_ReturnCode _fc_createShapePartsFromFaceInfoList( FC_Mesh mesh,
00084                              _FC_SFI_ARRAY *in_faceinfolist,
00085                              char **basename,            
00086                              double compangle,
00087                              int shared_dim,
00088                              int *numSides, 
00089                              FC_Subset** newFaceSubsets,
00090                              FC_Subset** newElemSubsets,
00091                              int ***adjmatrix);
00092 
00093 //helpers for sorted face info array
00094 FC_ReturnCode _fc_initSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
00095 int _fc_addToSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi, _FC_FACEINFO* fi);
00096 FC_ReturnCode _fc_lookupInSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi, int i, _FC_FACEINFO** fi);
00097 FC_ReturnCode _fc_removeFromSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi, int i, _FC_FACEINFO** fi);
00098 int _fc_reallocSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
00099 void _fc_printSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
00100 void _fc_freeSFI_Array(_FC_SFI_ARRAY *sfi);
